name: Cold War Battleship
description:
Ever wanted to experience what a cold war would feel like if it ever went hot and you were caught in the middle between two sides? In this game, your job is to shoot down as many missiles as you can before the missile sink you, see how far you can get! (This is a school project and most likely will not be getting updated) Hope you enjoy our fun little game!

Artist:

Amelia Moschkau

Gary Menting

Jared Rosen

Kylie Meyer

Samuel Lambert

Programmers:

Addison Braun

Zach Eason

Zoom Coe

Sound:

All sound used is royalty free from mixkit or freesound!
